thread.title: Watch live: Donald Trump participates in wreath-laying ceremony at Arlington National Cemetery
thread.title_full: Watch live: Donald Trump participates in wreath-laying ceremony at Arlington National Cemetery

author: USA TODAY NETWORK
title: Watch live: Donald Trump participates in wreath-laying ceremony at Arlington National Cemetery
text:
Watch live: Donald Trump participates in wreath-laying ceremony at Arlington National Cemetery The USA TODAY NETWORK will have live coverage of this event. Post to Facebook Watch live: Donald Trump participates in wreath-laying ceremony at Arlington National Cemetery The USA TODAY NETWORK will have live coverage of this event.  //usat.ly/2k5jTnU   2 To   Watch live: Donald Trump participates in wreath-laying ceremony at Arlington National Cemetery USA TODAY NETWORK 2:46 p.m. ET Jan. 19, 2017 US President Barack Obama's limo arrives for a wreath-laying ceremony at the Tomb of the Unknown Soldier at Arlington National Cemetery in Arlington, Virginia to commemorate Veterans Day on November 11, 2016. / AFP / YURI GRIPAS (Photo credit should read YURI GRIPAS/AFP/Getty Images) (Photo: YURI GRIPAS, AFP/Getty Images) 
On Thursday, the day before his inauguration, President-elect Donald Trump and VP-elect Mike Pence will take part in a wreath-laying ceremony at Arlington National Cemetery. Visitors hoping to catch a glimpse of the next president may get their first chance later during a concert event being held near the Lincoln Memorial beginning at 4 p.m. CLOSE Share TRUMP INAUGURATION PREP Raw: Trump arrives in Washington area | 1:31 President-elect Donald Trump arrived in the Washington area Thursday ahead of his Friday inauguration. (Jan. 19) AP 1 of 22 Share TRUMP INAUGURATION PREP Everything you need to know about Inauguration Day in 2 minutes | 2:08 Donald Trump will be sworn in as the 45th president of the United States on Inauguration Day. Here's some of the nuances of this historical day. USA TODAY 2 of 22 TRUMP INAUGURATION PREP Inauguration security by the numbers | 1:19 Donald Trump's inauguration security will cost millions. Elizabeth Keatinge (@ekeatinge) has more. Buzz60 3 of 22 Share TRUMP INAUGURATION PREP Inauguration ceremony carries rich history | 2:34 A host of myths, enduring traditions and presidential foibles fill the history of presidential inaugurations. Historian Jim Bendat recalls the history and meaning of the ceremony, along with some memorable speeches. (Jan. 18) AP 4 of 22 Share TRUMP INAUGURATION PREP The attendance, cost and other big numbers behind Trump's inauguration | 0:50 An estimated 800,000 people will show up to watch Donald Trump take the oath of office. Video provided by Newsy Newslook 5 of 22 Share TRUMP INAUGURATION PREP Trump, Pence to take oaths on bibles used by Lincoln, Reagan | 1:32 President Obama also took the oath with the Bible that President Lincoln used. Video provided by Newsy Newslook 6 of 22 Share TRUMP INAUGURATION PREP Trump calls part of GOP tax plan 'too complicated' | 1:10 Donald Trump says the US dollar is too strong to be competitive. He called a GOP tax plan that would make the dollar even stronger "too complicated." Video provided by Newsy Newslook 7 of 22 Share TRUMP INAUGURATION PREP Diplomats join Trump at dinner in Washington | 2:24 President-elect Donald Trump welcomed diplomats, donors and soon-to-be White House staff to dinner in Washington on Tuesday. Trump addressed the group, praising Vice-President-elect Mike Pence and his pick for Secretary of State, Rex Tillerson. (Jan. 18) AP 8 of 22 Share TRUMP INAUGURATION PREP How the White House prepares for the next president | 2:12 Former White House staffer Anita McBride reveals what goes on behind the scenes on Inauguration Day. Video provided by Newsy Newslook 9 of 22 Share TRUMP INAUGURATION PREP Presidential inaugurations by the numbers | 1:21 Before Donald Trump officially becomes the 45th President, he has to take the Oath of Office. As Veuer's Nick Cardona tells us, there are some important numbers about presidential inaugurations you should know about. Buzz60 10 of 22 Share TRUMP INAUGURATION PREP Dress rehearsal for Donald Trump's Presidential Inauguration at the United States Capitol. | 1:06 The U.S. Capitol was abuzz with activity during the dress rehearsal for the 58th Presidential Inauguration at the United States Capitol. USA TODAY 11 of 22 Share TRUMP INAUGURATION PREP Trump inauguration singer just wants Americans to unite | 1:29 Tim Rushlow, a country music singer tapped to perform at President-elect Donald Trump’s inauguration ceremony, says he only wants to unite Americans with his performance and that he’s not worried about critics. (Jan. 16) AP 12 of 22 Share TRUMP INAUGURATION PREP 'We the People' activists promote unity through art for inauguration | 1:06 Check out this artwork commissioned by Amplifier Foundation to, "disrupt the rising tide of hate and fear in America" Emily Drooby (@emilydrooby) has the story. Buzz60 13 of 22 Share TRUMP INAUGURATION PREP Toby Keith won’t apologize for performing at inauguration | 0:45 Toby Keith says he isn’t sorry for agreeing to perform at Donald Trump’s presidential inauguration after facing criticism Time 14 of 22 Share TRUMP INAUGURATION PREP Alec Baldwin and others to protest Trump inauguration | 0:56 Some of the entertainment world’s biggest stars plan to protest Donald Trump’s inauguration the night before his big day. Nathan Rousseau Smith (@fantasticmrnate) has the story. Buzz60 15 of 22 Share TRUMP INAUGURATION PREP Obama administration urges Trump to 'reach out' to John Lewis | 1:08 Dozens of Democratic lawmakers are boycotting Trump's inauguration after he criticized Georgia congressman and civil rights icon John Lewis. Video provided by Newsy Newslook 16 of 22 Share TRUMP INAUGURATION PREP Punchlines: Washington gets ready for Trump | 3:56 The late-night comics on the week leading up to Inauguration Day. Take a look at our favorite jokes, then vote for yours at opinion.usatoday.com. USA TODAY Opinion_Eileen Rivers 17 of 22 Share TRUMP INAUGURATION PREP President Obama has one big request for Donald Trump | 1:34 In President Obama’s interview with '60 Minutes,' the outgoing president makes a request of President-elect Donald Trump. Nathan Rousseau Smith (@fantasticmrnate) has details. Buzz60 18 of 22 Share TRUMP INAUGURATION PREP Trump will reportedly boot all Obama-appointed ambassadors on day one | 1:00 Donald Trump is reportedly telling Obama-appointed ambassadors they have to be out by Inauguration Day — no exceptions. Video provided by Newsy Newslook 19 of 22 Share TRUMP INAUGURATION PREP Inauguration announcer dropped by Trump | 0:51 Hear Charles Brotman's heartbreaking reaction to being cut by Trump Team. Emily Drooby has the story. Buzz60 20 of 22 Share TRUMP INAUGURATION PREP Former presidents will be attending Trump's inauguration | 1:41 After weeks of uncertainty, former presidents George W. Bush and Bill Clinton said they will attend Donald Trump's inauguration. Video provided by Newsy Newslook 21 of 22 Share TRUMP INAUGURATION PREP Clintons will attend Trump's inauguration | 0:29 Despite their bitter rivalry, Bill and Hillary Clinton plan to keep with tradition and attend Donald Trump's inauguration.
